name: Copy of Search for cases in Salesforce

input.where: =[_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","External_ID__c"]}').present? ? "External_ID__c = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","External_ID__c"]}') + "'" : nil, _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","ContactId"]}').present? ? "ContactId = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","ContactId"]}') + "'" : nil, _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Room__c"]}').present? ? "Room__c = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Room__c"]}') + "'" : nil, _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Status"]}').present? ? "Status = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Status"]}') + "'" : nil, _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Priority"]}').present? ? "Priority = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Priority"]}') + "'" : nil, _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Type"]}').present? ? "Type = '" + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","Type"]}') + "'" : nil].compact.join(' AND ')

extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
